name: SPEEDWAVE
description:
SPEEDWAVE is a time-attack racing game where you speed your way through tracks such as CRASHSITE, SPEEDWAY, DOWNTOWN or go beyond the sound barrier with the HYPERSPEEDWAY track! Challenge yourself to get to the end as fast as you can and collect as many crystals as you can!

This project was made for Columbia College Chicago's 2021 Game Studio Capstone Project that was completed in 15 weeks.

Installation Instructions:

Unzip the file and run the application!

This project is also available  on Github

Credits:

Programming: Adolfo Nava
Music & SFX: Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio, Infraction, MokkaMusic, and Celina
Environmental Art: Veronica Morrissette
Character Art & Design: VampItUp / Ray Martin
Prop Art and Modeling: Julius Rodriguez
Sound Design: Zoe Maddix
Additional Art Assets Created By: 3DJungle, Daniel Kole Productions, Dogmatic Games, Ethan Taylor, EVPO Games, Havolk, Karboosx, KitBash3D, Kkssr, TurboSquid, Typodermic Fonts, Sherbb
